creator: boris@folgmann.de
text:
The call of su in /usr/bin/jasper4 does not work on Linux.

root@titan root# /usr/bin/jasper4 jspc -webapp
/var/tomcat4/webapps/tiles-documentation
su: invalid option -- w
Try `su --help' for more information.

Solution:
1. You have to change the order of switches from
su - user -c cmd
to
su -c cmd - user 

2. Additionally cmd has to be protected so that it's not interpreted by su.

I can't find any reference to su in the jasper scripts. I am no linux expert 
so if I have missed the blindingly obvious, please reopen this report and 
include a reference to the script (pref a url to the CVS repository).
creator: markt@apache.org
